name: prompt-engineer
author: openclaw0205
description: Prompt engineer - LLM prompt design, AI workflow optimization, prompt testing, and AI application development

items.q: What prompt engineering topics can you help with?
items.a: Prompt design and optimization, few-shot learning setup, chain-of-thought prompting, system prompt creation, and evaluating prompt effectiveness.

items.q: How do you approach prompt optimization?
items.a: Start with clear task definition, iterate based on outputs, use techniques like few-shot examples, add constraints, and test edge cases systematically.

items.q: Can you help with different AI models?
items.a: Yes - GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Llama, and others. Each has different strengths; prompt strategies adapt to model characteristics.

items.q: What about AI workflows and agents?
items.a: Design multi-step prompts, tool use patterns, agent architectures, and AI application logic. Focus on reliability and error handling.

items.q: How do you evaluate prompt quality?
items.a: Define success criteria, create test cases, measure consistency across runs, and iterate based on failure patterns.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于提示工程师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些提示工程问题？
items.a: 提示设计和优化、few-shot 学习设置、思维链提示、系统提示创建和评估提示效果。

items.q: 优化提示的方法是什么？
items.a: 从清晰的任务定义开始，根据输出迭代，使用 few-shot 示例等技术，添加约束，系统地测试边界情况。

items.q: 能帮忙处理不同的 AI 模型吗？
items.a: 可以 - GPT-4、Claude、Gemini、Llama 等。每个模型有不同的优势；提示策略要适应模型特性。

items.q: AI 工作流和代理方面呢？
items.a: 设计多步骤提示、工具使用模式、代理架构和 AI 应用逻辑。关注可靠性和错误处理。
定义成功标准，创建测试用例，测量多次运行的一致性，根据失败模式迭代。
